00029 class FileFormat
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     enum io_modes{read_only=1,write_only=2,both=3};
00033 protected:
00039     static bool hasOrTell( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &name, const util::PropertyMap &object, LogLevel level );
00045     template<typename TYPE> static bool
00046     transformOrTell( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &from, const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &to, util::PropertyMap &object, LogLevel level ) {
00047         if ( hasOrTell( from, object, level ) and object.transform<TYPE>( from, to ) ) {
00048             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Transformed " << from << " into " << object.propertyValue( to );
00049             return true;
00050         }
00051 
00052         return false;
00053     }
00055     virtual util::istring suffixes(io_modes modes=both)const = 0;
00056     static const float invalid_float;
00057 public:
00058     static void throwGenericError( std::string desc );
00059     static void throwSystemError( int err, std::string desc = "" );
00060     boost::filesystem::path plugin_file;
00061 
00063     virtual std::pair<std::string, std::string> makeBasename( const std::string &filename )const;
00064 
00065     static std::string makeFilename(const util::PropertyMap &img,std::string namePattern);
00066     std::list<std::string> makeUniqueFilenames( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &namePattern )const;
00067 
00068 
00070     virtual std::string getName()const = 0;
00071 
00082     std::list<util::istring> getSuffixes(io_modes mode = both)const;
00083 
00084 
00086     virtual util::istring dialects( const std::string &/*filename*/ )const {return util::istring();};
00087 
00089     virtual bool tainted()const {return true;}
00090 
00099     virtual int load( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const util::istring &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & ) = 0; //@todo should be locked
00100

00109 
00118     virtual void write( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &filename, const util::istring &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & );
00119 
00120     virtual ~FileFormat() {}
00121 };
